snippet: The F.B.I. has joined the search for six world championship belts stolen from the International Boxing Hall of Fame in Central New York.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation's Antiquities Bureau assists investigation into theft of six world championship belts from International Boxing Hall of Fame museum outside Syracuse, NY.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. has joined the search for six world championship belts stolen from the International Boxing Hall of Fame in Central New York.
